translations.translation: Have We not given him two eyes,
Did We not give him two eyes,
Did We not grant him two eyes,
Have We not given him two eyes,
Did We not make two eyes for him?
Have We not made for him two eyes
Have We not given him two eyes,
Have We not appointed to him two eyes,
Did We not assign unto him two eyes
Have We not given him two eyes,
Have We not, made for him two eyes
Have We not made for him two eyes,
Have We not made for him a pair of eyes?-
Have We not made for him a pair of eyes?
Have We not given him two eyes,
Did We not give him two eyes?
Have We not made for him two eyes?
[90:8]   Have We not given (an interrogative meant as an affirmative, in other words, ‘We have [certainly] given’) him two eyes,
Allah then mentioned the blessings He bestowed upon him, saying: (Did We not assign unto him two eyes) with which he sees

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: وكيف يتأتى إنكار إطلاعنا إياه وإلى ما صدر عنه؟! { أَلَمْ نَجْعَل لَّهُ } ولم نظهر في جسده حين صورناه بمقتضى حولنا وقوتنا وكمال قدرتنا { عَيْنَيْنِ } [البلد: 8] ليبصر بهما عجائب صنعتنا وغرائب حكمتنا
